tag_list: massimo-agostinelli, max-aengevelt, rhone-group, aengevelt, agostinelli, myhomepage-com
overview: Massimo Agostinelli is an entrepreneur and co-founder of the myhomepage.com. Agostinelli co-founded myhomepage in August 2009 with fellow classmate Max Aengevelt while attending the European Business School. Agostinelli is actively involved in myhomepage Ltd. as a company director and is listed as a member of the board at Companies House in London, UK. Both Agostinelli and Aengevelt have been featured in multiple main stream media portals along with having been interviewed by OK TV.
